function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 outbreak impaired individuals' mental health resulting in anxiety, stress, and depression","Impact":"Increased prevalence of mental health symptoms","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective measures (e.g., reduction of population mobility, strengthening individual protection, public education)","Technologies":"Public health education and awareness campaigns","People":"Affected individuals, especially those in quarantine","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Ambiguity and limited information about COVID-19, media influences, and increased perception of harm to physical, social, and financial health","Impact":"Exacerbation of mental health problems","Mitigation":"Provision of accurate and clear information, reducing media influence, and addressing perceived harm through education","Technologies":"Health communication platforms, media literacy programs","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities, media outlets"},{"Description":"Prevalence of psychological disorders dependent on the number of infected individuals and location","Impact":"Higher prevalence of psychological disorders in COVID-19 epicenters","Mitigation":"Targeted mental health support in affected regions, access to accurate information","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health hotlines","People":"Communities in COVID-19 epicenters","Owner":"Local health agencies, mental health organizations"}]}
